dialog.text: The bottom half of the image is covered with grass. The top of the grass is a little lower on the left than right.
What does the top half look like?
The top of the grass should make a mild slope downward to the left. Right above it, there are trees that go up to a bit more than half of the image, from left to top of the grass on the right.
Should the trees be shorter? More or less trees?
The trees should be shorter (just a bit above the middle) and continuous.
Is there anything in the sky?
Yes, there is a range of cloud right above the trees and the grass, very thin. There is also a small circle of cloud a bit above the trees, almost to the middle of the upper half (a little left).
Do I have the right amount of clouds?
The middle cloud should be smaller.
Should I make it smaller? By how much?
Yes, make it 5 times smaller. Also, the sky should be blue, if you can change the weather to make it so.
Is there anything else on the grass?
No, but can you make the grass on the right curve up a little (eating into the trees).
There is more grass now. Do you want me to add bushes or starws?
Yes, more grass. But it is just grass, not bushes or straws.
